node.title: VoiceFlowPro Landing Readiness Master Plan
node.comment: North-star program for delivering a production-ready VoiceFlowPro marketing site that converts, complies, and scales. Built from executive summary, business goals, landing website task, and legal action plans.

node.title: Vision & Success Criteria
node.comment: Define measurable business outcomes and what “production-ready” means across product, revenue, trust, and growth levers.

node.title: North-Star Goals
node.comment: • Hit €35k MRR within 12 months (executive summary). • Convert 6.5% of pricing visitors to signup (business goal). • Drive ≥4% newsletter opt-in, FAQ bounce <35%, average session >2 minutes (attached KPIs).

node.title: Launch Quality Gate
node.comment: Checklist for production readiness: frictionless signup-to-checkout, reliable downloads, legal compliance, analytics stack, responsive UX, 99.9% uptime expectation, incident playbook.

node.title: Measurement Framework
node.comment: Implement analytics plan (GA4 + PostHog) for funnel: landing → pricing → signup → checkout → subscription success; include product-qualified signals (audio upload, first transcript).

node.title: Brand & Narrative
node.comment: Ensure messaging resonates with legal, media, enterprise segments highlighted in business foundation document.

node.title: Core Messaging refresh
node.comment: Align hero, feature, and use-case copy with executive summary pillars: privacy-first AI, legal-grade transcripts, EU compliance, hybrid deployment.

node.title: Content Assets
node.comment: Produce comparative tables (human vs AI), industry use-case modules, testimonial pipeline, and downloadable whitepaper teaser for newsletter.

node.title: Visual Direction
node.comment: Create design system tokens, imagery guidelines, and brand illustrations that support trust & privacy narrative.

node.title: Product Experience Web
node.comment: Deliver seamless flows for evaluate → try → buy → use. Based on landing-website-task and current bug backlog.

node.title: Acquisition Funnel
node.comment: Optimize homepage, feature breakdown, pricing CTAs. Run A/B tests for free vs pro CTAs, integrate trust badges and compliance proof.

node.title: Signup & Auth
node.comment: Finalize session-backed signup/login with hashed passwords, validation, error states, forgot password roadmap, and onboarding welcome email.

node.title: Checkout Excellence
node.comment: Stabilize Stripe setup with live-ready price IDs, confirm Payment Element renders, handle 3DS, send receipt webhooks, and build success page with next steps.

node.title: Download Distribution
node.comment: Implement signed binary hosting (GitHub Releases/S3), checksum verification, licensing key enforcement, and automated release pipeline bridging git push to downloadable artefact.

node.title: Post-Signup Activation
node.comment: Design onboarding email sequence, in-app checklist, and frictionless first transcript guide to drive trial conversion.

node.title: Commerce & Monetization
node.comment: Ensure we can charge, manage plans, and report revenue aligned with business-goal filing.

node.title: Stripe Configuration
node.comment: Complete test/live price parity, tax settings, webhook signing, customer portal enablement, invoice branding, and refund policy hooks.

node.title: Billing UX
node.comment: Design plan comparison, upgrade/downgrade flows, VAT input, invoice history UI, email triggers for payment events.

node.title: Financial Reporting
node.comment: Create RevOps dashboard: MRR/ARR, churn, LTV, trial-to-paid, channel attribution. Integrate with Stripe Sigma or analytics stack.

node.title: Trust, Compliance & Legal
node.comment: Meet legal document drafting plan and privacy commitments from business foundation.

node.title: Policy Suite Delivery
node.comment: Draft ToS, Privacy Policy, License Agreement using templates, adapt to transcription specifics, run professional review, publish with version control.

node.title: GDPR & Security Signals
node.comment: Implement data request workflows, cookie consent banner, DPA readiness, encryption documentation, and security FAQ.

node.title: Legal Site Requirements
node.comment: Create Mentions Légales, CGV, warranty disclaimers, accessibility statement (RGAA baseline).

node.title: Growth & Distribution
node.comment: Build inbound/outbound channels to fill funnel per marketing strategy.

node.title: SEO & Content Engine
node.comment: Keyword research for legal/audio niches, pillar pages, programmatic FAQs, structured data, blog calendar (12-week focus).

node.title: Demand Programs
node.comment: Campaign plan: LinkedIn thought leadership, legal influencer partnerships, webinar series, newsletter automation (4% opt-in goal).

node.title: Conversion Optimization
node.comment: Set up experimentation backlog: hero headline tests, pricing layout, social proof variations, lead magnet gating.

node.title: Engineering Excellence
node.comment: Keep codebase maintainable while shipping fast.

node.title: Architecture & Infrastructure
node.comment: Document client/server architecture, finalize hosting (render/vercel), CI/CD pipeline, environment promotion, secrets management.

node.title: Quality & Testing
node.comment: Introduce automated tests (Vitest, Playwright), integration suites (Stripe mocks), accessibility audits, performance budgets, incident logging.

node.title: Team Ops
node.comment: Set contribution guidelines, branching model, code review SLAs, backlog management, release notes process.

node.title: Launch & Post-Launch Plan
node.comment: Define path to public announcement and immediate next iterations.

node.title: Beta Validation
node.comment: Private beta with legal/media segments, collect qualitative feedback, iterate on onboarding.

node.title: Public Launch
node.comment: Launch checklist: site freeze, scaling checks, press kit, product hunt/LinkedIn campaigns, support schedules.

node.title: 30/60/90 Day Roadmap
node.comment: Plan incremental releases: self-serve teams, analytics dashboards, API launch, internationalization.
